name: Buy House
description: Buying a house involves selecting a property, securing financing, making an offer, completing inspections, and finalizing the purchase through closing.

name: Rent House
description: Renting a house involves finding a suitable property, signing a lease agreement, paying rent and security deposits, and following the landlord's terms.

name: Sell House
description: Selling a house involves setting a price, listing the property, marketing, negotiating offers, completing inspections, and closing the sale with legal paperwork.

name: Flat & Buildings
description: A flat is a single residential unit within a multi-story building, while a building is a structure that can contain multiple flats, offices, or other spaces.

name: Shops & Malls
description: A shop is a small retail space selling goods or services, while a mall is a large complex with multiple shops, restaurants, and entertainment facilities.

name: 24/7 Services
description: 24/7 services operate continuously, providing support, products, or assistance at any time of day or night, ensuring round-the-clock availability.
